Class TableManager

java.lang.Object
TableManager
public class TableManager extends Object
Manager class for tables.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    TableManager​(ArrayList<Table> tables)
    Constructor specifying the list of all tables in the restaurant.

    • calculateTableCapacity

      public int calculateTableCapacity​(int numOfPax)
      Calculates the suitable table capacity for a specified number of people of a group.
      Parameters:
      numOfPax - Number of people in this group
      Returns:
      suitable table capacity (2, 4, 6, 8, or 10) for this group

    • changeTableOccupiedStatus

      public void changeTableOccupiedStatus​(int tableid, boolean occupied)
      Changes the occupied status of a table.
      Parameters:
      tableid - Table number of this table
      occupied - The new occupied status (true or false) for this table. true for occupied and false for not occupied

    • changeTableReservedStatus

      public void changeTableReservedStatus​(int tableid, boolean reserved)
      Changes the reserved status of a table.
      Parameters:
      tableid - Table number of this table
      reserved - The new reserved status (true or false) of this table. true for reserved and false for not reserved
